review: Best.Love it.Where was my life before this product?!Seriously. Very easy to use.A must have if you use Netflix, Prime, Hulu, Crackle etc. Streaming media is great.When we want to go to a friend's house and watch a movie-- we just take the Chromecast.No DVDs. No game console. Fits in your pocket.
